msContents.summary: List of payments by various individuals for the poll-tax

msItemStruct.note: 19 lines along the fibers; on the back are line ends of an account written against the fibers, unpublished; see intro. to P.Ross.Georg. IV 21
Left margin extant; a kollesis runs down the papyrus near the abbreviation for "onoma"
cf. CPR XXII 18, 24; P.Lond. IV, esp. 1419 with intro. on p. 166-177; for prosopographical overlap with P.Lond. IV, see comm. to P.Ross.Georg. IV 21
For a photo, see P.Ross.Georg. IV 21, Tafel 3

provenance.p: From the collection of N. Likhachov; once housed in the Paleographical Museum of the Academy of Science in St. Petersburg; now in the Hermitage Museum
